item.title: Angular - Add loading spinner
item.description: Use Rxjs and Interceptor to show and hide loading spinner in Angular when processing API. The technique is same as building a lightbox effect Modal. Implementation Add service Generate service through command ng g s loading loading.service.ts private _loading = new BehaviorSubject<boolean>(false); public readonly $loading = this._loading.asObservable(); show() { this._loading.next(true); } hide() { this._loading.next(false); } Add component Generate component through command ng g c loading loading.component.html Show the loader only when loading$ is true.
